definition: military practice, esp. for reservists or new recruits/military training as a (sometimes compulsory) subject in schools and colleges/drill

sentences.english: Two deep middle when military training?
Meanwhile, Beihang officials canceled military training activities on October 30.
sentences.chinese: 10月30日這天，北航校方取消了軍訓活動。

sentences.english: The first day of my high school, I was told that the freshmen would need to join the military training.
sentences.chinese: 在我上高中的第一天，我被告知將需要參加軍訓。

sentences.english: Then upon entrance, the pace for freshmen is set with three weeks of mandatory military training.
sentences.chinese: 進入大學之後，新生被要求參加約三週的強制性軍訓。

sentences.english: The prince was expected to spend his birthday on Thursday on Army training.
sentences.chinese: 哈里王子將於本週四在軍訓中度過自己的生日。

sentences.english: "Going out for exercise, " answered Jo with a mischievous twinkle in her eyes.
sentences.chinese: “出去軍訓”，喬調皮地眨動着眼睛。

sentences.english: He said Stalnaker's seizures are the result of a head injury he suffered about 10 years ago during a military training exercise.
sentences.chinese: 的中風是由於十年前在一次軍訓中頭部受傷所致。

sentences.english: When the military would be over in the morning, the drillmaster asked my son what his name was.
sentences.chinese: 上午軍訓課快要結束的時候，教官問兒子叫什麼名字。

sentences.english: But, the military when in military training to our demands are high.
sentences.chinese: 但是，教官在軍訓的時候對我們的要求還是很高的。

sentences.english: But when I entered junior high school and had the military training.
sentences.chinese: 後來，我升初中的時候，參加了軍訓。

sentences.english: During our first summer vacation, we took part in military training, which laster for 3 weeks.
sentences.chinese: 在第一個暑假期間，我們參加了維期3周的軍訓。

sentences.english: I maintained that military training should be given to all students.
sentences.chinese: 我堅持所有的學生應全受軍訓。

sentences.english: And I am one of them, who was in MT Class 8.
sentences.chinese: 而我正是其中的一員，位於軍訓8排。

sentences.english: During the training period, I had experienced a great hardship due to the hot weather and severe trainers.
sentences.chinese: 在軍訓期間，我必須面對炎熱的天氣和嚴厲的教官。

sentences.english: Basically, we're supposed to be more tamed and obedient after the training.
sentences.chinese: 基本上，他們希望我們軍訓後能夠更加溫馴和順從。

sentences.english: Freshmen in universities are often troubled with some diseases during the course of military training.
sentences.chinese: 學校新生軍訓期間經常受一些疾病影響其參訓率。

definition: to make up missed lesson/to reschedule a class
to finish class/to get out of class
to sunbathe/to tan/to get sunburnt/to expose unfair practices (on a consumer protection website)
Nyima county, Tibetan: Nyi ma rdzong in Nagchu prefecture 那曲地區|那曲地区[Na4 qu3 di4 qu1], central Tibet
senior male fellow student or apprentice/son (older than oneself) of one's teacher
to strip naked/to strip nude/(coll.) to find oneself a partner
